308170.name: Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar - Bannermen Pack
308170.description: Let your enemies on the battlefield know what they are dealing with. The free Bannermen DLC for Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar adds four new and fully-animated units to the game: including the Roman Aquilifer and the Gallic Hornblower. These will be automatically added to your AI units upon download and will be placed in proportion to the ranks and upgrades of your associated officers - as well as making your veteran units look more distinctive and impressive on the battlefield.
308170.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语, 意大利语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
